original_title:
Bill Gates is upset because RFK Jr. stopped funding the mRNA experimental drugs. Gates was using these drugs to sterilize young people and increase cancer rates to reduce global population.

"All the progress we've made is at risk."  — The Donald
article_summary: Bill Gates is upset about the funding cut for mRNA experimental drugs, which he allegedly used to sterilize young people and increase cancer rates, as RFK Jr. stopped the funding. Online discussions question Gates' motives and ethics, with some suggesting he has enough personal funds to continue his work.</s>
